CustomField.description: Future Recommendation is to leverage SF Trigger or Flow
CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "NF-SPP", ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Draft"), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Coordinators__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Manager__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(SPP_Office_Reviewer2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Technical_Rep2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Contracting_Officer2__c)) )
CustomField.label: NF-SPP Submit Approval Checkbox
